translations: 果子甜面包；葡萄干甜面包

sentences.sentence: The Austrians and Germans, each think their Stollen is better;
sentences.translation: 奥地利和德国人各自觉得自己的史多伦比对方的强；

sentences.sentence: When it comes to Stollen - The German chefs argue amongst themselves as to whose Grandmother had the best recipe.
sentences.translation: 对于史多伦- 德国师傅互相争论谁的老祖母的配方最好；
